description:
At the Hydrogen Americas Summit, fossil fuel giants attempt to redefine “clean” hydrogen, with profits from tax incentives in mind.

The post ‘Thumb on the Scale’: Big Oil Aims to Cash in on Hydrogen Tax Credits – with Natural Gas appeared first on DeSmog.
title: ‘Thumb on the Scale’: Big Oil Aims to Cash in on Hydrogen Tax Credits – with Natural Gas

description:
After a 2022 frack out, residents of New Freeport, PA, report rashes, and foul methane-spiked water. EQT denies responsibility, offering water for silence from residents.

The post There Is Something Wrong Under New Freeport appeared first on DeSmog.
title: There Is Something Wrong Under New Freeport

description:
Tomakomai, Japan’s government-funded carbon capture and storage (CCS) project, is considered the cornerstone of the nation’s push to make CCS part of Asia’s energy future. But behind the plant’s shiny facade is a worrying reality.

The post Japan, Oil Majors Tout CCS Tomakomai Project as Flagship of Asia’s Energy Future appeared first on DeSmog.
title: Japan, Oil Majors Tout CCS Tomakomai Project as Flagship of Asia’s Energy Future

description:
Conservative donors have gifted over £6.8 million to think tanks in the Tufton Street network since 2019, Democracy for Sale and DeSmog can reveal.  Most of these think tanks hide their funders’ identities, but several wealthy Tory supporters disclose their donations to Tufton Street in the accounts of their charitable trusts.  Tufton Street groups have […]

The post Tory Donors Have Pumped Almost £7 Million into Tufton Street Since 2019 appeared first on DeSmog.
title: Tory Donors Have Pumped Almost £7 Million into Tufton Street Since 2019

description:
Speaking outside Downing Street on 23 May, announcing a general election for 4 July, Prime Minister Rishi Sunak took a swipe at what he dubbed “environmental dogma”. It was a sign of how much has changed since 2021, when the UK hosted the flagship COP26 UN climate summit with a promise to “irrefutably to turn […]

The post Mapped: The Tory Network of Climate Denial and Fossil Fuel Funding appeared first on DeSmog.
title: Mapped: The Tory Network of Climate Denial and Fossil Fuel Funding
